name: included
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
containing something as a part of something else, or making something part of something else: The trip cost a total of £250, insurance included. Everyone, me included, agreed to the plan. See
include
More examplesFewer examplesThe fee covers everything, babysitter included.They published their recruitment policies online, incentives included.Cars must be moved off the street, ours included.
